A1 the number 8: She was eight (years old) when her family moved here. We've got eight people coming to dinner.
More examplesFewer examplesThe shops shut at eight o'clock on Wednesday evenings.The sum of 13 and 8 is 21.We've been married eight years.There'll be eight for dinner, counting ourselves.Can you read this figure? Is it a three or an eight?
